titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House until June 1 and a conditional adjournment or recess of the Senate until June 6.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

vote.text: House Agreed to Senate Amendments 001, 002 by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/25/1988--Passed Senate amended. (Measure passed Senate, amended) Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from May 26, 1988, until June 1, 1988, and of the Senate from May 26, 27, or 28, 1988, until June 6, 1988.
